dublin_core.dcvalue: Ian Francis, Director for Diagnostics and Surveillance, Global Solutions for Infectious Diseases, Email: ifrancis@gsid.org | Kieran Sharpey-Schafer, South Africa Country Director, Dimagi, Email: ksharpey @dimagi.com

An Android based software with case management and reporting features including delivery of RDT results, automated data collection, digitizing reporting, real-time disease reporting and quality assurance of RDT administration.

Mobile HIV and Malaria Diagnosis and Reporting System
Sensors and Point-of-Care Diagnostics, data collection and reporting, HIV/AIDS, Malaria
